title: Uruviel, Woodland Maid (15U26)
text:
Set:	The Hunters
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Follower
Resistance:	+1
Game Text:	Aid - (1). (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add(1) to transfer this to a companion.) Each time you transfer this to a companion, you may exert an Elf to make the fellowship's current site a forest until the end of the turn.
Rarity:	U
